MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL18 postcode area of Rhyl affecting properties in Bryn Hafod and the surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 10:35am. Our engineers are on site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 1.45pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11.12am on the 28th January 2021.
